_GEng_Anim_FrameCount: Get the number of frames in an Animation Object
_GEng_Anim_FrameAdd: Add a frame to an Animation Object
```GEng_Animation.au3_GEng_Anim_FrameAdd(ByRef $hAnim, ByRef $hImage, $iFramDuration, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)```
_GEng_Anim_FrameMod: ```GEng_Animation.au3_GEng_Anim_FrameMod(ByRef $hAnim, $iFrameNumber, ByRef $hImage, $iFramDuration = Default, $x = Default, $y = Default, $w = Default, $h = Default)```
